stance_1: I am concerned about health effects of meat
stance_2: I want to cut back on meat
justification: The interviewee states that health concerns motivate their desire to cut back on meat.

stance_2: I eat meat every day
justification: Eating meat every day conflicts with health concerns about meat.

stance_2: I enjoy the taste of meat
